docs.title: Ansible
docs.text: My collection of Ansible roles, playbooks, & inventories (inventory files are examples, meant to be copied & built from).

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
Note

This project was build with PDM. If you prefer another tool like Poetry, make sure to convert the pyproject.toml file to a Poetry-compatible format.

  • (Optional) pdm Python project manager
  • You can also pip install -r requirements/requirements.txt
